title: Sell Super Tuscan Wine

metaDescription: Sell your Super Tuscan wines. We buy Sassicaia, Tignanello, Masseto, Ornellaia, and Solaia. Direct offers for Italian wine collections.
heroSubhead: We buy Sassicaia, Masseto, Tignanello, and other top Italian wines.
introParagraph: Super Tuscans represent the pinnacle of modern Italian winemaking. We purchase investment-grade bottles from Bolgheri and beyond, including Sassicaia, Masseto, Ornellaia, and Tignanello. Whether you have recent releases or mature vintages from the 1980s and 90s, we provide competitive direct offers.
whatWeDoNotBuy: Standard Chianti Classico (unless part of a large collection)
Bottles with torn or illegible labels
photoChecklist: Neck label or DOC/DOCG strip (if applicable to the specific wine, though many are IGT)
conditionFactors: Fill level is critical for older vintages (top shoulder or better)
Label condition (staining or tears reduce value)
Capsule integrity (signs of corrosion or seepage)
pricingFactors: Producer prestige (Masseto and Sassicaia command top tier prices)

faqs.question: Do you buy Tignanello?
faqs.answer: Yes, Tignanello is one of the most consistent wines we buy. Older vintages are particularly desirable.

faqs.question: Is Sassicaia valuable?
faqs.answer: Sassicaia is the original Super Tuscan and highly valuable, especially strong vintages like 1985, 2015, and 2016.

faqs.question: Do you buy Ornellaia artist labels?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Vendemmia d'Artista bottles are collectible and we pay a premium for them.

faqs.question: What is a Super Tuscan?
faqs.answer: These are Tuscan wines that often use international grape varieties like Cabernet Sauvignon and Merlot, operating outside traditional DOC regulations.

faqs.question: Do you buy large formats?
faqs.answer: Yes, we actively buy magnums, double magnums, and larger formats of Super Tuscans.

faqs.question: How do I ship my wine?
faqs.answer: We provide specialized wine shipping kits with foam inserts to safely transport your bottles.
